Description

Trebuchet is a brand new VR studio based in Montreal, QC. Prison Boss VR, our first project, is due for release on Steam this August.

History

Founded in May 2017, Trebuchet aims to create great interactive content for VR. In July 2017, Trebuchet won the "Best Game Experience" award for the game jam entry BLACKHOLE FRIDAY at Jam Nations Montréal.

Projects

  • Prison Boss VR
